name: SpeedMaze
description:
Welcome to SpeedMaze!  a game made on game maker 8 (yeah, i still use that thing)

(THIS GAME IS ON SPANISH)

This is a Maze type game where you need to collect gems or complete puzzles to get to the next level, try to get your best time, score and death count!

This game is in Develovment, every 2 weeks there will be a new update!

You can also Join the discord (its mainly on spanish lol)    here!
